thread.title: Questions about the new Futurama mobile game?
thread.title_full: Questions about the new Futurama mobile game?

author: USA TODAY
title: Questions about the new Futurama mobile game?
text:
Questions about the new Futurama mobile game? Jefferson Graham , USA TODAY Published 9:08 a.m. ET Feb. 22, 2017 | Updated 54 minutes ago Futurama, the long-running sci-fi cartoon, is coming back to life as a mobile game, from JamCity. (Photo: Futurama) 31 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Get your questions ready about the next " Futurama " adventures for Fry, Bender and Leela. The gang from the future have escaped TV cancellation heaven to re-unite in mobile game land and are coming soon to an iPhone or Android near you from mobile game maker JamCity. 
We'll be at JamCity today to fill you in. 
Tune in to our live broadcast on Facebook at 2 p.m. ET, where we go behind the scenes with JamCity co-founders Chris De Wolfe and Josh Yguado. JamCity announced a revival of the beloved sci-fi cartoon series, Futurama , from "The Simpsons" creator Matt Groening and writer David X. Cohen. The free game is expected to launch in the summer. Futurama returns as a mobile game 
Futurama , set in the year 3,000, and last seen with new episodes in 2013, is being re-imagined. What makes this a little unusual is the stars of the show, Billy West, Katey Sagal and John DiMaggio are back to lend their voices to their characters, along with the original writers. JamCity says the game will update weekly. 
Join us on Facebook for the live broadcast today.We'll be live here: https://www.facebook.com/usatodaymoney/ 
Screen shot of upcoming "Futurama" game from JamCity (Photo: JamCity) Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2m7Jxxh NEVER MISS OUT Tech Be the earliest adopter. Know what’s in, what’s out, and what’s awesome before anyone else does, Monday-Friday. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Tech NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
